5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Umar said:“The Prophet (ﷺ), then Abu Bakr, then ‘Umar, used to pray the ‘Eid prayer before delivering the sermon.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the ‘Eid Prayers
